website_summaries.verdict: With similar construction,  excellent performance, and a reasonable price, these golf balls are worth considering for all levels of play, making them close contenders for the best.
pros: Offer features players love, including 3-piece construction, urethane covers, and low compression
cons: Some golfers gripe that they feel a bit too hard, and a few noted cut covers or cracked balls after typical play

customer_reviews.title: Surprising distance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Snell black for it's soft cover to try to get more backspin. I have low swing speed and do not take a divot with my irons, so I do not see noticeable improvement on spin. I have always used low compression balls such as the Titleist DT Trusoft for distance. The Snell obviously has a harder core but I am seeing longer drives with it. It is my go-to ball now. I am a senior with 17 index.
customer_reviews.author: WurlitzBurg

customer_reviews.title: They’re no Pro-V1......
customer_reviews.text: BUT, they are awesome. I know the backstory to the creator and these balls are not the quality of Pro-v’s around the green. However, for a mid price ball they respond and act great. I would compare these to Maxfli Soft (around the same price range). These trump the Maxfli’s around the green. For bogey golfers on a budget who go through a dozen every 3-4 rounds, this is the ball for you! I want to try the MTB Red because I don’t know which one is better but this black model is still great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: I have played E6 and E6Soft for years and been very happy with these. I cannot force myself to spend over $40 for golf balls. Having read all the review I decided to try the Snell balls. I use the MTB, but may switch to the MTB-X. I tried the SUM, but flew way to high. I get a bit less distance but more height with the MTB in comparison the E6Soft. In summary, the review and comparisons that rate the Snell balls are dead on. I love this ball. My age 76, handicap 13, driving distance 215 - 240.
customer_reviews.author: C J Philsted

customer_reviews.title: Played Titleist PRoV1 my entire life until now.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ball and plays comparable to a PRoV1. Long off the tee and soft around the green. Spin was perfect off my wedge on approach shots. High highly recommend this ball. I am a 8 handicap .
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stahlka

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Golfing Ball
customer_reviews.text: Snell says they are as good as the ProV he helped design. I've been playing them for a year now, and though I'm not a good enough player to know for sure if he's right, I have found no reason to doubt him. My iron shots usually stop close to the ball mark and they are plenty long off the tee. They go far when I hit 'em far and they putt straight when I putt 'em straight.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mays

customer_reviews.title: Really like this ball
customer_reviews.text: Played 3-4 rounds so far and really like these balls. Pretty durable as I’ve had a few drives hit cart paths and barely a scratch on the ball. Feel and playability around greens is nice too. I seem to lose less balls playing these as well. They didn’t magically straighten out my drives though. Will definitely play these the rest of the season this year
customer_reviews.author: JimmyTheSaint

customer_reviews.title: Spin spin spin
customer_reviews.text: The spin these balls have off of my coney wedges is amazing for the price. These stay as well as pro v1’s for almost half the price. These will be my balls until I find something better for the same price, and I highly doubt that’s going to happen anytime soon. Great ball snell
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: If you like Pro V’s you’ll love this ball
customer_reviews.text: My brother bought these and he gave me a sleeve. I liked them so much I bought a dozen. I love this ball. Great Distance and responds well around greens.
customer_reviews.author: BCRA19

customer_reviews.title: Good price, if you like them.
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally play with Provies, and marginally like them better, but am keep going back to Bridgestone E12 soft, and feel more confidence. I'm 73 years old, with diminished swing speed. It happens, guys
customer_reviews.author: erndog

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as the name brand ball
customer_reviews.text: Very playable ball, long and straight but still soft around the greens. Very comparable to the higher priced brand name ball. I have already ordered a second dozen as I have days where I can lose a few.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: If you like the Prov 1 type ball you should play this ball that is all I have to say. The price is not bad too.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ball!
customer_reviews.text: The best golf ball I have used! I’m a 2 hdcp and I’ve played every ball. You can’t find a better ball at any price, let alone at the price of the Snell!! Does it all!
customer_reviews.author: Carl F. Oaklund

customer_reviews.title: great balls
customer_reviews.text: i think these are better for my game than the reds. i suggest getting the sample packman try both because i thought the reds would fit me better but it was the other way around. feel and play a lot like a pro v.
customer_reviews.author: Big jim

customer_reviews.title: MTB Black Go long
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and the performance is good too. I like low spinning balls as my swing speed is 100 - 105 MPH on Driver. Almost as good as my TP5X, not quite as good on checking.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Time 009

customer_reviews.title: They play well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played through a few sleeves of these and really like them. Nice distance. Good spin around greens. Don’t know that it’s a pro V1 exactly, but a very good golf ball
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome option for amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Replaced my prov1 with these for new courses. Feel not as bad when one goes in the woods
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: There great until you lose them. I'm a hacker and buy the Snell ball because they are cheaper than the major brands, but they do work as good as the best around the greens. Then I hit out of bounds and lose a good ball, DUH!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: As good as Pro V but much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love these golf balls. As good if not better than Pro V balls at a much cheaper price point.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Best ball out there and the best price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely every bit as good as ProV1 or any other premium ball. Save money and buy these. You’ll be completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ball. Length, straighter flight, good control, great “feel” putting.
customer_reviews.author: SCWer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome feel
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy another ball brand. Great value. Feel and distance equivalent to Pro V and To.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more Pro Vs for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great balls for even a higher price. They don't spin too much on my drives but you can put spin on them with your short clubs. I am hooked on these. I like the black version.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cost to performance ratio out there by far
customer_reviews.text: These golf balls have consistently proven to perform as well as all the top of the line balls. If you aren't a scratch golfer and you aren't buying Snell, you're crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Grice

customer_reviews.title: Same as Pro V
customer_reviews.text: This ball plays a well or better than Pro V. The consistency is excellent both driving and short game.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nootz

customer_reviews.title: Watch for a good price...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent golf balls. When they are on sale for $32, with free shipping, it's my go-to ball.
customer_reviews.author: One-of-a-Kind

customer_reviews.title: These are Money!
customer_reviews.text: I either use ProV or these...but no one can ever tell a difference. Much better pricing!!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as ProV1's
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be just as good as ProV1's. Great feel and enough distance to perform as expected.
customer_reviews.author: tacchad

customer_reviews.title: Better than my game
customer_reviews.text: These balls are great. They have the feel I was looking for and distance I did not expect. They took my game up a notch. I can only imagine what they could do for a better player.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Slavin

customer_reviews.title: Top notch ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball has excellent feel and a forgiving ball. Great control on the greens. Very good distance.
customer_reviews.author: Conrado N Tojino Jr

customer_reviews.title: This is a great golf ball and is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Want a ball that you don't have to pay a fortune for? This is the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Snell has matched Pro V
customer_reviews.text: These are Titliest Pro V knock offs for cheaper pricing. Nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Afton

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable ball that is soft around the greens and goes long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball performs as well as any on the market. Great performance for medium swing speeds. The ball is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: 4dpackers12

customer_reviews.title: Great tour quality golf ball.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball for the price. Very comparable to top tour balls.
customer_reviews.author: Hall

customer_reviews.title: Play the same pay less
customer_reviews.text: Play just as well as ProV1 they do come off putter a little hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Man

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I find this ball very comparable to Titleist Pro V1 or similar high quality balls. Great distance on drives and spin wedges....great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, distance and durable. My new go to golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: joseph t franco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Golf ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8 hcp and love these balls. Every bit as good as Pro Vs and better for a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Great golf ball. I used to play pro V one X. Will never again. Snell makes a great product
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Distance and feel !
customer_reviews.text: This ball feels and reacts just like the Pro V1 ball.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Crisostomo

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and I would put this up against pro-v and Bridgestone balls any day. Actually felt like I got extra yards with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great ball just like Titleist ProV1. Arrived guickly after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good as pro v’s  I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were of similar quality of other brands that cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it. Not to hard or soft
customer_reviews.author: Philip P

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a top of the line golf ball but don’t want to pay $45-60 a dozen? These are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Moseley

product_meta.title: Snell MTB Black Golf Balls
product_meta.description:
The Next Generation of our Original MTB

Features:

3-piece construction with 360 dimple pattern Urethane cover providing short game controlExcellent feel and durabilityNEW 7% lower Compression Core maximizing distances by lowering spin off the Driver.Conforms to USGA standards and are legal for tournament play.
feature_bullets: The Package Weight Of The Product Is 1.6 Pounds
